title: Good news guys!!!
body:
Lee Sin's pick rate has dropped from 33% to 32.9% hallelujah!
whatever you're doing riot keep it up! 

So at this rate, in 229 weeks he will have a normal pick rate again! :D i cant wait.

replies.body: Don't get your hopes up, it is the Christmas holidays, give it a week and it will be back to normal.
True, i didn't think about all the kids on holiday without internet....
